description:
Open source technology based on Zhongzhou rhyme input method engine/Rime Input Method Engine.

### Package Specific
#### Package Parameters
The following package parameter can be set:

 * `/T` - install as a Traditional Chinese IME (zh_TW locale)
 
To pass parameters, use `--params "''"` (e.g. `choco install weasel [other options] --params="'/T'"`).
To have choco remember parameters on upgrade, be sure to set `choco feature enable -n=useRememberedArgumentsForUpgrades`.
author: Rime Team.
